long_description: The innnovative 2L Reversible Reservoir from Hydrapak features a patented sliding top opening that fastens securely yet opens wide for fast filling and turns inside-out to make clean-up a breeze. Shape-Shift(TM) technology features a versatile baffle that can be zipped to slim the reservoir profile and unzipped to increase fluid volume or reverse to clean and dry. To clean, simply slide open, reach in, reverse, and rinse. High-flow bite valve with twist shutoff; Straight Shot Plug-N-Play connector allows easy tube removal while keeping the reservoir securely sealed. Durable, flexible thermoplastic polyurethane materials are BPA- and PVC-free, dishwasher-safe and naturally anti-fungal. All seams on the Hydrapak 3L Reversible Reservoir are welded to eliminate leaking.
